name: Evolving Stories
description:
Evolving Stories was completed as the final project of the Red Group (Momilani Ramstrum and Rodney DuPlessis) for the Nomadic Soundsters residency program. It pulls sonic and visual material collected by the two artists into a loose narrative about evolving states, choice, and being. Evolving Stories features forking paths that explore themes of humor, absurdity, loss, grief, discovery, dreams, and nature.

Evolving Stories was created using Twine (SugarCube 2).
